name: Splurge
description:
Splurge is a multiplayer strategy game where up to 8 players play on an online board and the only goal is to be the last player remaining. Select a colour and splurge all over the place to dominate your friends! Place on a blank tile to claim it, and fill it up to immediately claim all tiles adjacent to it, but watch out as your friends can do the same. Will you survive the splurge purge?

Epic splurging tutorial:


Features:
  • 2-8 players
  • Online multiplayer
  • Custom soundtrack
  • 5 different map types to play on
  • Colourblind support
  • In-game lobby list

How to play:
Each player takes turns filling in a cell on a tile with their colour. Once a tile has all of its cells full, it explodes, or 'splurges', spreading your colour into any neighbouring tiles. This can claim unclaimed tiles, or ones already claimed by your friends, and can create long splurge chains! Last splurger remaining wins.
